name: 17 at Alden-Houston
review description: Amazing food beautifully prepared with an ambiance fit for a King! We celebrated our anniversary there,and couldn't have asked for a more romantic atmosphere!

name: 51Fifteen Restaurant & Lounge
review description: The food was outstanding as well as the service. It is a perfect place for a quiet dinner.The refurbished decor is beautiful. The black chairs look great and are comfortable. The curtain effect at the back of the restaurant adds softness as well privacy for private parties.

name: Aldo's Cucina Italiana
review description: Food and service were outstanding. Very good choices on menu. Only disappointment was the wine list is pricey. We were celebrating our anniversary and they provided at no charge an excellent dessert. Nice touch.

name: Américas - The Woodlands
address: 21 Waterway Avenue Ste. 130 The Woodlands, TX  77380
review description: Food was fantastic once again. Everyone enjoyed the meal and the steaks were outstanding! our waiter was less than attentive. In almost two hours we never got a refill on our drinks except for water.

name: Américas River Oaks
review description: The charusscos steak was over priced for the quality and taste.The salmon caleinte and chileno sea bass was delicious.Service was mediocre.

name: Amerigo's - The Woodlands
address: 25250 Grogans Park Dr The Woodlands, TX  77380
review description: Food is a bit pricey and was not as good as it has been on prior visits.

name: Arcodoro - Houston
review description: Food and service great contrary to some of the negative reviews we read prior to going.

name: Armandos
review description: Always a pleasure to dine here.

name: Artisans Restaurant
review description: This is my second time to dine at Artisan's. It was simply outstanding again. Food, service, ambiance were all excellent. Great choice for a night out!

name: Artista
address: 800 Bagby Street, Suite 400 Hobby Center of the Performing Arts Houston, TX  77002
review description: Wonderful location and atmosphere. Quality food

name: Arturo's Uptown Italiano
review description: First off, I will not use valet parking. Arturo's has valet parking, but also mucho self parking spaces, so they get a big plus for that. Second,the food is very good, as is the service. Third, they have a great covered patio. I'm in.

name: Aura Restaurant
review description: We went for a special birthday celebration for my husband with daughter and late teen grandson. The table was lovely and conversation was easy to hear each other. The waiter was not knowledgable on wine, but we ended up from our own experience w/ a very nice Graves. Everyone loved their salads, entrees (3 had fish which they loved--I had seafood risotto--the seafood was a little over cooked & salty, but OK). We shared 3 different desserts, which were all outstanding.

name: Azuma - Downtown
review description: I can't say enough good things about this visit. My boyfriend and I have always enjoyed dining here, but this dinner was the best. Due to traffic, we arrived late, and now we were going to be rushed to dine before our play started. The hostess was kind enough to seat us promptly near the door, and our waiter David made suggestions to help us pick a quick meal. David also got drinks and the bill to us quickly to help expedite the process. He was wonderful about making sure we had a great time at dinner, but still left us time to walk to the Alley. I look forward to returning soon, but this time for a more relaxed dining experience. Thanks for saving the evening!

name: Azuma - Kirby
review description: Never disappointed! Try the crazy Irishman role! The samplers off the hot appetizer section are delish!

name: Azuma on the Lake
review description: Disappointed with the fried tofu (appetizer) but everything else was excellent (as always). Service has been consistently good lately.

name: Benihana - Houston
review description: The overall experience was good. The chicken was just slightly over cooked, but the chicken friend rice made up for it. Our chef seemed a little tired that evening and had a little dry humor. The other tables seemed to be having a better time with their chef, but truly had no real complaints about our chef overall. Great for a first date, and to celebrate birthday's (as I did).

name: Benihana - Houston - Downtown
review description: Benihana used to be one of my favorite places to go as a kid and I enjoyed taking my daughter there, but the place looks SO DATED! It really needs to be upgraded and improved. Also, I remember these big flares of flame and better presentation than was available on our night. Food was good, but think other Japanese steak houses / hibachi grills have improved on the Benihana experience.

name: Benihana - Sugar Land
address: 2579 Town Center Blvd N Sugar Land, TX  77479
review description: i love this place send me more coupons :-)

name: Benihana - The Woodlands
review description: Food was ok. I ordered the delux. The lobster and steak. Lobster was over cooked and steak was dry. Not impressed by food. Also, the waiter forgot a few drink ordersa. Wich took forever to correct. I wish this place had some better skilled people. They were nice, but not impressed

name: benjy's in the village
review description: Everyone at our table ordered salads, yet it took almost 35 minutes for our lunch. This was a business lunch and the extended time, shifted our schedule.

name: benjy's upper washington
review description: Besides the delicious, beautifully served dinners, the customer service and friendliness were also outstanding. Our waiter and the manager went the extra mile to please us and make our dining experience memorable.

name: Bernardo's @ the Hotel Galvez
review description: It is tough to find a really nice restaurant in Galveston. Even when I asked our hotel concierge, he said "I don't know, maybe Landry's or Saltgrass?" Really??? So I did the best I could online and chose Bernardo's. No one was there on a Sunday night. Waited a half hour for our bottle of wine only to learn they didn't have it available. Food was good. Ambiance was a little too "hotel-like" instead of "nice restaurant-like." But since there really isn't much else on town that qualifies as "fine dining," I would have to recommend it.

name: The Bird & The Bear
review description: I went to celebrate a special occasion with a friend. The wine and ambiance were wonderful.

name: Birraporetti's
review description: We had a great dinner before our show at Birraporetti's. Always enjoy our experience at this great restaurant.

name: Birraporetti's - Friendswood
address: 400 W. Parkwood Ave/F.M.528 Ste. 100 Friendswood, TX  77546
review description: Excellent Sunday Brunch at a very reasonable price. It was advertized as a jazz brunch so I expected live music but was disappointed, although the piped music was quite nice.

name: Bistro Alex @ Hotel Sorella CityCentre
review description: Every time I eat at Bistro Alex my expectations are exceeded. The food, service and management are tops in Houuston. I love this place so much that last year I proposed in the restaurant and me and my fiance were treated like royalty. If you eat here I highly suggest saving room for dessert and getting the almond and orange tea cake. It is hands down the best dessert I have ever had!

name: Bistro des Amis
review description: This was our second visit, and it was just as good as the first. It's a casual, but very earnest place. My brother is becoming addicted to the cassoulet. If I lived in the area I would probably eat here weekly.

name: Bistro Lancaster @The Lancaster Hotel
review description: Classic restaurant in the Houston theater district, part of a boutique hotel. Dining room reminds one of a small restaurant in London. We have been going there for many years in conjunction with Alley Theatre performances.

name: BlackFinn American Grille - Houston
review description: I visited BlackFinn for my birthday celebration and was greeted nicely. I had a reserved table for 8 people, but arrived and one guest was waiting. Due to my other guest running late, I was asked to wait in the lobby or in the bar until my entire party arrived. We couldn't be seated until then. Eventually two guest short, they sat us. The atmosphere was good and the waitress was nice. I ordered the salmon w/rice and asparagus. There was no sauce, which I found was odd and my asparagus had grill grittiness. I asked for a replacement with broccoli and received it with no problem. My girlfriend complained that her blackened shrimp was too black. We expected a little more and as a Chef, I wanted more.....

name: BLU - Restaurant & Lounge
review description: We have dined here several times and just love it. The food is always mouthwatering and very fresh tasting. Everyone that we have brought here to eat has been pleasantly surprised too. There are several places to eat in Sugar Land but it is nice to have a restaurant that the food and service are better than good. Yummy, Yummy, Yummy!

name: Brady's Landing
review description: We went there for Sunday Brunch and te food was great. We requested a well done prime rib Chef Casey went out and beyond and made it for us no questions asked. He even dressed the dish up with garnish. He personally went and have it done. Many thanks to Chef Casey For the outstanding service!

name: Branch Water Tavern
review description: Usually I can never complain about BWT, but the service was not as good as it usually is. The waiter literally took our drink order one at a time... he would take one persons, leave, bring it to the table then take the next persons- and repeat the process. Other than that, the experience and food is always good.

name: Brasserie 19
review description: Seafood salad was tasty but very light on seafood. My lunch guest raved about the grilled octopus. Wine list on ipad had great, inexpensive choices.

name: Brasserie Max & Julie
review description: Had a nice time - it was our first visit. We will definitely be back! The salad I had (Salad Max & Julie ) - was a bit watered down (wet salad greens)= couldn't taste the dressing! My trout Provencal was outstanding as was the Tarte Tatin for dessert!

name: Brennan's of Houston
review description: It was my partners birthday and they made it special! The food was fantastic and the service was great!

name: Brenner’s Steakhouse Katy Freeway
review description: Great food, great service. Note that it is smaller than what is expected.

name: Brenner's Steakhouse on the Bayou
review description: The ambiance was great. The music inside the restaurant was very loud and disturbing. It was very hard to carry on a conversation with your group. It took over 30 minutes to get our dinner and once we did, the quail that one of us ordered was over cooked and very crispy. The shrimp I ordered was chewy( over cooked). When we complained to the manager, all he said was note taken. Thanks for mentioning it to him and that he would speak to the kitchen about it.We go to most Landry's restaurant but this one we won't go back again.

name: Buca di Beppo - Houston - Portofino
review description: Excellent service, food & atmosphere! I very highly recommend Bucca di Beppo to everyone!! We were celebrating our wedding with dinner at Bucca ... the staff made our experience on of the best we've ever had!!

name: Buca di Beppo - Houston - Speedway
review description: My friends and I had a girls night out. The Food and service were outstanding. I will definitely eat here again for any occasion. The ambiance is very quaint. Loved all the pictures on the walls.

name: The Cafe at Brookwood
review description: The dining experiance is wonderful, being served by the residents is a great time, the food is the best and the ambiance is the best.

name: Cafe Benedicte
review description: Had a large group for dinner and it was quiet enough to carry on a conversation.Food was diverse and good. Everyone had a great time.

name: Cafe du Bois
address: 2845 Town Center Circle West Kingwood Town Center Kingwood, TX  77339
review description: I don't know why there were so few people in there. At first we were a little hesitant to go in since it appeared empty. It was about 8 PM so it was a little past the busier time. The food was DELICIOUS, the wait staff attentive but not cloying. The live music was beautiful. I would definately recommend it to someone for a romantic night out.

name: Cafe Eccell
review description: A great place for a girlfriend catch up visit. Quiet and fun food/

name: Cafe Ginger
review description: Food was terrible! Especially the bread or fried dishes like dumplings and pancakes to moo shoo pork. Also very little shrimp or chicken in main dishes

name: Capital Grille - Houston
review description: ALways an outstanding meal cooked to perfection. And the Lobster mac and cheese was unbelievable.

name: Carmelo's Ristorante Italiano - Houston
review description: Food was great and staff were fab. Celebrated our anniversary and was presented with a slice of cake (yum) on a plate that had happy anniversary dressed in chocolate around the rim

name: Cavatore Italian Restaurant
review description: You must have the Caesar salad if you go here!

name: Charivari
review description: It's a romantic spot; service was great as well. Food is good, but not worth the price.

name: Chez Nous French Restaurant
review description: Chez Nous did a beautiful job making my birthday special. Food, service and wine was wonderful.

name: Christopher's Italian Restaurant
review description: Food wasn't bad, but wasn't special either. Also took alot longer than we were expecting.

name: Christopher's World Grille
review description: Food and service were out of this world as usual.

name: Churrascos - River Oaks
review description: It's always a treat and pleasure to dine at Churrascos River Oaks. It a special place for my wife and I. The service is outstanding and so is the food. We cherish Churrascos. If you haven't exprienced Churrascos you should do so soon.

name: Churrascos - Westchase
review description: Great food and service. The tres leches desert is unbelievable.

name: Churrascos-Sugar Land
address: 1520 Lake Pointe Parkway #500 Sugar Land, TX  77478
review description: Service was ok in the beginning and got much better when another waiter helped our waiter who was in the weeds a little and couldn't focus on his tables as needed to provide better service. Food ... Maybe it was the particular time I went but everything was cold except , 1 beef empanada I had... And when spending 27.00 for a buffet i expect more.I could go on and on about the food being cold but I will only use one word to describe it is dissapointing.

name: Claudio's & Mattia's Trattoria Piano Bar
address: 3202 Marina Bay Dr Ste M League City, TX  77565
review description: I was kind of disappointed after reading several favorable reviews. The pasta was bland. The snapper plate had the rice, veggies & fish all in 1 big pile.

name: Convivio
review description: best spanish tapas in houston!Everything is delicious!Great service! Good wine selection!The paella is outstanding and the tres leches is a must!

name: Coppa Ristorante Italiano
address: 5555 Washington Avenue Suite A Houston, TX  77007
review description: We're group of 5 for dinner and enjoyed the food we ordered, however, the service was non-attenative and they forgot to serve the B-D cake we oredered ahead of time. Also, they did not have herbal or any non-cafeine tea or coffee - strange.

name: Crapitto's Cucina Italiana
review description: My wife and I have dined at Crappito's many times ... so we took 4 of our friends/colleagues. One of the couples are well versed foodies. They laughed at the name of the restaurant ... but once the meal started, they were in heaven. "This is the best risotto I have had in all of my life" was one comment followed by a string superlatives. The other couple had dietary/religious requirements - no problem and the nummy sounds over their salmon dinners did not stop. Service was excellent, as always - attentive and very friendly. The surroundings are very pleasing and the price is appropriate. I am always nervous taking friends to a restaurant that I have touted their offerings, but have never had to worry with Crappito's. Just fantastic!

name: Crave Sushi
address: 2900 Travis Street Suite F Houston, TX  77006
review description: Great spot. Look forward to going back.

name: Crossroads at House of Blues - Houston
review description: I loved everything about the House of Blues experience. I dis noy like the parking situation but that is no fault of HOB. Everything on the menu is responsibly priced and I had the best burger ever. I will come again.

name: Cullen's Upscale American Grille
review description: Everything was great! I said kid friendly but I was there during the week. If the same little girl would have been running around making noise on the weekend I would have been a little less forgiving. Hopefully the parents would not allow that. Service was good, food was great and the price was fitting.

name: Da Marco
review description: The food was excellent. Everything we ordered was delicious - perfectly cooked and seasoned. We'll definitely be back.

name: Daily Grill - Houston
address: 5085 Westheimer Blvd., Suite 3125 In the Galleria next to the Westin Galleria Houston, TX  77056
review description: Very relaxing atmosphere! Pleasant experience.

name: Damian's Cucina Italiana
review description: Always a good meal. And now... best of all, they have a dress code: No Shorts, Not tee Shirts, No Exceptions! No Slobs! We need more of this in Houston!

name: Del Frisco's Double Eagle Steak House - Houston
review description: I would definitely come back there for a special occasion. The food was good considering that I am not a huge steak eater.We had a great view of the city. The only request we had was for booth seating and that request was met. I think that Del Frisco's is a great place to celebrate a special occasion, but not for every day dining simple because of the prices. Overall, we had a great experience.

name: Eddie V's - City Center
review description: Business meeting setting was well received. I will be recommending to my colleagues.

name: Eddie V's - West Ave
address: 2800 Kirby Drive Suite A-100 Houston, TX  77098
review description: The food was delicious, as it always is.We were sat in a back, secluded, kind of banquet room. The ambiance was just OK and took away from the experience.We had a couple of waiters introduce themselves as our server all at once so it was kind of strange to start off with. Then the man who ended up taking care of us must have been cut fo rthe night, because we felt rushed. He dropped the check at the same time he delivered the dessert and then came back to ask for the credit card while we were still eating!

name: El Meson
review description: Could up the quality of the bar options, food was great!

name: Eric's-Univ of Houston-Hilton College
review description: Eric's is great place to dine before taking in a concert or play at the University of Houston.

name: Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar - Houston
review description: Dinning expierence was good. Busy Friday night with an active dinning area, bar and patio areas. This is the first time we have been to Flemmings and we would go again. Our server was Charles and he was very helpful, engaged and professional. I would encourage anyone dinning there to ask for him directly. Wine, salads, desserts and side items were all good. Kiddos to the Flemmings potatoes. It's a shame you can't get those directly, they are very good. Steaks were good but slightly uneven. My wife's was good and prepared perfectly for her, I felt as thought mine was just a little over done.Eat here period, it's good.

name: Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar - Houston Beltway
address: 788 W. Sam Houston Pkwy North Houston, TX  77024
review description: Excellent host, excellent food, excellent wait staff and excellent visit. as usual.

name: Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar - The Woodlands
address: 1201 Lake Woodlands Drive, The Woodlands Mall Suite 305 The Woodlands, TX  77380
review description: Four of us celebrated a friends BIG birthday. The wait staff was so pleasant and accommodating. They were extremely attentive to us and everything was wonderful. The food was delicious and it arrived hot. The waters were promptly refilled and the bread was always brought out hot. At the end our friend was presented with a lovely box of truffles from the restaurant.

name: Frank's Chop House
review description: Outstanding value for the dollar. Food was very high quality, surroundings were pleasingly upscale, and service was attentive and courteous. Highly recommended for business lunches!

name: Fratelli's Ristorante
address: 1330 Wirt Rd Suite D Houston, TX  77055
review description: Had the veal parm and it was the best I've had in a very long time. Very tender veal with an excellent crusting. My buddy had a roasted chicken dish and his only comment was he'll be back again for the same. Our server was very attentive and helpful. Barbara, the owner, stopped by to thank us for coming; I thought that was very classy. This is a great place to have lunch and we'll be back.

name: Gaido's Seafood Restaurant
review description: Gaido's was a wonderful place to eat. The food was delicious and the service was excellent, but the dish lacked the plate presentation for the price. My husband and I shared the seafood combination plate with snapper, scallops, and grilled shrimp. While it tasted great, it looked like it was slapped on the plate and snapper fillet was extremely small. Overall, it was very good; however, I do not think we will order the same dish on our next vacation.

name: Gigi's Asian Bistro and Dumpling Bar
review description: I sent the information from OpenTable, and told the hostest that it was our anniversary. We wanted a table that had nice romatic area, such as one of the curtain tables that NOBODY was sitting at. Was told that this was only reserved for party of 6 or more. No parties of more than 4 showed up there while we were dining. We were left in an open dining room, with a waiter that we had to find. The food was OK, but not great. I actually had to add soy sauce because the food lacked salt. My wife enjoyed her fish, but the vegetables were not well seasoned. The DimSum very tasty, but very small portion for the price paid. I expected considerably more in everything for the price paid.

name: Glass Wall
review description: We were hesitant to try this restaurant after seeing many mediocre reviews but decided to give it a go since it is almost within walking distance from home. We found the service awkward and the food a bit below average. Both cuts of beef were less than tender and lacked flavor (let's just say the leftovers are going to my dogs) and although the sides were tasty it was only due to the abundance of butter in everything. The highlight for me was the unique bowl my soup was served in - not exactly what I hope to leave a pricey restaurant excited about.

name: Greek Brothers Oyster Bar & Grill
review description: Food tasted great. We ordered grilled shrimp and grilled chicken and enjoyed it very much. We even stayed for the entertainment and danced the night away. Haven't done that in a long time. Will definitely look for this band again when they return to our area. So fun!

name: Grotto - Houston
review description: you helped make my sister's birthday very special. We all appreciated your efforts on our behalf.

name: The Grove
review description: The restaurant was nice and view was good but I feel the quality of food didn't match the price there were asking for.

name: Guri do Sul Brazilian Steakhouse
address: 1400 Research Forest Drive The Woodlands, TX  77381
review description: Great cuts of meat! Prepared with delicious spices! Shrimp and Lamp Chops were divine!

name: Haven
review description: Food was as usual top notch. Using locally sourced organic vegetables and meats, the chef has once again combined the best of Texas flavors with fine cuisine.

name: Hearsay Gastro Lounge
review description: Great place for an up-casual meeting with people who enjoy drinks with their food. Reasonable price for valet parking ($5). Nice bar, helpful serving staff. Gets a bit congested later in the evening because the restaurant is narrow, but they did a good job avoiding true overcrowding. Food could best be characterized as a haute-cuisine take on bar-food: tasty, and pairs nicely with your alcohol. Looking forward to going back!

name: Hubbell & Hudson Market & Bistro
review description: Always a wonderful meal from H&H and this time was no exception! Service was impeccable. Menu had changed from last time I was there - but it was all excellent! This was a celebration supper and it was all I could have asked for and more!

name: Ibiza Food and Wine Bar
review description: Incredibly consistent, dinner was terrific, should have been voted #1 restaurant in Houston....

name: III Forks - Houston
review description: The service was amazing! Our server was very attentive, and the manager stopped by to check on us as well. This was our first time dining at lll Forks, and we will definitely go back.

name: Inn at Dos Brisas
review description: Best restaurant I have ever been to and I have been to some great restaurants.

name: J. McKinney's at the Hotel Fredonia
review description: The wine was wonderful, new menu items devine, we will be back each month for Wine and Dine.

name: Jamaica House
review description: Very affordable, and our favorites tasted just as we remembered them from our last trip to Jamaica. Restaurant was casual and comfortable. The sweet potato fries are FANTASTIC.

name: Jasper's - The Woodlands
address: 9595 Six Pines Dr #900 The Woodlands, TX  77380
review description: we had a romantic dinner at a great place..food and drinks were great tasting, great quailty and flavor! Our waiter was on "his A game". The level of noise was a bit higher than some places--but it was not unbearable.

name: Julia's Bistro
review description: The food was just okay but overpriced. The service is extremely slow. We went on a Thursday. There was only one other couple when we arrived. We sat for about 10 minutes until we were finally able to flag someone to take our drink order.

name: Kata Robata
address: 3600 Kirby Drive Suite H Houston, TX  77098
review description: Great meal and service. Too noisy for conversation.

name: Katsuya - Houston - SBE
review description: Unfortunately Katsuya is more of a name without the food or service to back it up. We had a group of 6, and we all enjoy sushi. Not a single person in the group thought Katsuya's sushi was anywhere near the best they'd ever had. It was fair-good in quality, nothing special, and I've had as good as or better sushi at much less flashy spots in Houston. Another issue we had was service. It was very slow and their team and our server did not make us feel very important. It took 15 minutes for our drinks to come out after we had to ask for our server to come take our order twice. The appetizers were expensive and very small when they came out. Overall, a fair experience. Nothing terrible, but nothing special. We will not be returning.

name: Killen's Steakhouse
review description: The best steaks I have ever had (superior to Ruths Chris) and the sides were fantastic. Extensive variety of steaks but otherwise a fairly short menu. Highly recommended, if your looking for someplace special to go and get fantastic food and great service this is it.

name: Kiran's
review description: We always enjoy the food and dining experience at one of our top Houston restaurants.

name: Kirby's Prime Steakhouse - The Woodlands
review description: I made a great impression on the wife choosing Kirby's as the place to celebrate our 37th year anniversary. Having valet parking available, roses (and card) waiting at the table, and that special touch of dessert at the end was something exceptional. Oh yeah, the servings of filet mignons each of us ordered was cooked to perfection. We've already told several friends about the experience.

name: Kona Grill - Houston
address: 5061 Westheimer Road Houston Galleria Houston, TX  77056
review description: I got a call an hour before the reservation to confirm the lunch and for the # of vegetarian menus required as I had requested in my reservation. This just set the tone of the excellent service that was to follow. The server kept on checking on us every few minutes for beverages/food. Food was served v fast and the group enjoyed their entrees. One of them had requested an egg salad and when the plates were being removed mentioned a few pieces of egg shells being present. The server was v apologetic and within a few minutes wrote off the salad from the bill. Shortly thereafter, the manager showed up, apologized, explained how they use fresh eggs, and made amends immediately with a huge cake! Kona won everyone over in our group!

name: Kris Bistro & Wine Lounge
review description: The wine list was excellent and very reasonable priced. The presentation of the food was lovely and everything was delicious. Our waiter was very attentive. We would definitely go back and recommend Kris Bistro.

name: La Brisa on the Creek
review description: Got there ahead of time from our reservation, but the hostess was very helpful and got us seated right away.Our favorite waitress (Patron)was'nt there and we paid for that by having to wait for our food, drinks, salsa refill but when we got served,..the food was hot and good. It was a bit noisey.

name: La Colombe d'Or
review description: Excellent staff and very personable. Can not wait to return.

name: La Griglia - Houston
review description: Food is always good. I often will have wine by the glass (wife does not drink) and they served my wine at the right temperature (i.e. cooler than "room temperature") which is something I don't see nearly often enough.

name: La Prima Grill
review description: The food and service were great. Our waitress was funny and hospitable. She served great Margaritas!

name: La Riviera Restaurant
address: 3700 S. Texas Ave. , Ste 300 Bryan, TX  77802
review description: The food was cooked perfectly and correct as ordered. The wait was short as well - perfect night out!

name: Las Alamedas
address: 23501 Cinco Ranch Blvd, Suite F140 Katy, TX  77494
review description: Las Alamedas always delights the senses with exceptional food, great wines and excellent service. They continue the fine tradition established in the Memorial area and it is now a pleasure to dine with them in our local neighborhood!

name: Las Ventanas
review description: The food was very nice; the margaritas you cannot take them lightly, they are very serious margaritas!

name: Latin Bites
address: 5709 Woodway Dr. Suite J Houston, TX  77057
review description: First time visiting Lating Bites and what it could have been a wonderful dining experience turned into a mediocre one, thanks to untrained wait staff.It took about 45 minutes to close our tab + 2 waiters + 1 manager and 3 credit card swipes (per person) to have our restaurant tab split evenly between 3 of us. I'm still checking my bank account to make sure my credit card hasn't been charged 3 different times. Food was delicious and cocktails were fantastic. I'll be visiting Latin Bites again, but next time I'll be paying cash.

name: Laurenzo's Restaurant
review description: We came for a birthday dinner on a Friday night. We had told them it was a birthday in the reservation but the waiter apparently never got that information. We all ordered prime rib, which we understood was their speciality. We were disappointed. It wasn't that any of the food was bad, but it was just nothing special. And my husband's full order (not the petit order) of prime rib looked just the same size as a petite order. The meat was very ordinary. The prices are certainly on the high side, so we did not feel we got good value for the money. Will try somewhere else next time for sure.

name: Line & Lariat
review description: We've been a few times---keeps getting worse and worse. This will be our last. We're pretty sure this hotel and restaurant are now just used for some kind of money laundering. They are constantly [extensively] remodeling the hotel and never seem to have all that many guests. They honestly don't seem to care about the restaurant at all. The food was all microwaved, but they might have used a toaster oven for the fries and fried catfish....the service was inattentive at best, it was really comical. There were only 3 tables and 5 service staff standing around and we waited forever. Such a beautiful space--it should be packed....but again, they don't seem to care if they have people in there or not.....something shady is going on there

name: Lomonte's Italian Restaurant & Bar
review description: This is our third year to celebrate our anniversary at Lomonte's. Each year they make it a special andmemorable occasion.

name: Luca & Leonardo Ristorante
address: 20 Waterway Ave., Ste 105 The Woodlands, TX  77380
review description: Emjoyed service, food and music. So fortunate weather allowed us outside which was special treat.

name: Luigi's Patio Ristorante
address: 3975 SH 6 South Suite 100 College Station, TX  77845
review description: A great place if your looking for something more than the local chain Italian food. The inside patio area offers a unique setting and the food is wonderful.

name: Lynn's Steakhouse
review description: As ALWAYS, LYNN'S STEAKHOUSE is head & shoulders above ANY Houston restaurant!

name: The M & M Restaurant & Bar
review description: Fried asparagus is our favorite. We were made aware of this resturant through Open Table.com and are returning customers.

name: Maggiano's - Houston
review description: Waitress didnt give my gf and me much attention. She was always over at the other table helping a party of 10. Even after she said she had an other waitress helping her. Poor serivce this time .

name: Majorca Bistro & Tapas
review description: great place, great staff, food was good, but they could do better on the dessert selection on the brunch buffet. Excellent value and wonderful band!

name: Mark's American Cuisine
review description: I can tell the good people at Mark's feel the same way.Our waiter helped us with wines, greatly described the apps and food and helped to indulge us with dessert. (Grayson)The content on the website and menus posted is helpful for foodies.

name: Masraff's
review description: My date and I went there to support the Tony's Prostate Cancer Research Foundation. Our waiter, Kenny was wonderful! I ordered muscato and he brought a German riesling as a second option. Appetizers; quail and calamari. I am not a fan of quail but the calamari was delicious. The entrees; pork chop and halibut were cooked to perfection. My date does not eat cheese so Kenny offered to replace the polenta for mashed potatoes. Dessert; peach creme brulee and sorbet. Peach brulee was a lovely surprise and the sorbet was the perfect after dinner dessert.

name: MAX's Wine Dive - Houston
address: 4720 Washington Avenue, Suite B Houston, TX  77007
review description: Food was delicious, service was decent considering how busy it was--their sunday brunch is the best!!!

name: McCormick & Schmick's Seafood - Houston
review description: I really enjoyed the food, along with their amazing cocktails

name: McCormick & Schmick's Seafood - Houston - Pavilions
review description: Our large group of 18 at one table and 12 at another had the "best of service" possible before our PLAY at the ALLEY.This is an annual treat for us.....and you made it very special with JASON our server, he's top of the line. Large groups don't intimidate him, because he's professional, classy, cool and friendly. Thanks Jason.

name: McCormick & Schmick's Town & Country Village
address: 791 Town & Country Blvd. Suite 160 Houston, TX  77024
review description: Great food and atmosphere! Appetizers are fantastic and wine list is pretty good. Reasonbly priced and noise level is low enough to have a normal conversation without yelling.

name: Mezzanotte Ristorante
review description: Food was wonderful had the best table in the bar. and the singer on Saturday was delightful. We had a great evening.

name: Mockingbird Bistro
review description: I decided to try Mockingbird Bistro on a Friday night for a first date and I was pleasantly surprised. Our waiter was extremely friendly and the staff in general were very nice. The food was delicous and I believe the manager or possibly the owner stopped by the table and made sure our experience was enjoyable. Will definitely come back. My date and I came in for dinner around 8:30PM. We split and appetizer, an entre, and ordered a bottle wine. We stayed pretty late and never felt rushed. I completely lost track of time and the staff was still friendly, this spoke volumes to me. I always hate being the last annoying customer at a place and try to avoid making people stay just for me, but this place was so accomodating.

name: Molto Bene Italian Restaurant
review description: Small restaurant. Nice, expensive wine list but they also have BYOB. Service was very good. Wait for the food was rather long, particularly since it is a small restaurant (call ahead for reservations), but worth the wait. The calamari was overdone, but the chicken marsala and spaghetti bolognese excellent. Very nice flavor. Will definitely return to this restaurant.

name: Monarch @ Hotel Zaza
review description: I would totally recommend the Monarch to anyone that wants to a great place for any occasion.

name: Morton's The Steakhouse - Houston - Downtown
review description: I don't usually do these surveys unless something horrible or outstanding happened. This place was amazing! I booked a reservation for my friends bday and the experience was over and beyond of what I was expecting. The printed custome menus to reflect his birthday. The server was very polite and hospitable. Great ambiance and food!

name: Morton's The Steakhouse - Houston - Galleria
review description: Always have a good meal and good service. This remains a first class restaurant.Howard Anders

name: Mo's a Place for Steaks - Houston
review description: Johnny is one of the best owner-managers in the business...He understands what it takes to run a restaurant.

name: Napoli Italian Restaurant
address: 4450 East Sam Houston Parkway South #A Pasadena, TX  77505
review description: Yum, yum, yum!!! As an Italian American I don't typically eat Italian food out at restaurants, but the meal I had a Napoli was authentic and delicious! I have been to Houston twice, and have enjoyed two meals at this restaurant.

name: Nardino
address: 14800 Westheimer Rd Suite D Houston, TX  77082
review description: Excellent food preparation, presentation and service.

name: Ninfa's on Navigation
review description: Fantastic experience. Wonderful for groups of any size. I enjoyed sitting in Moses' section - great customer service!! Will most certainly return & recommend.

name: NOE at the Omni Hotel-Houston
review description: Had a really great dinner fob was superb! Best kept secret in Houston.

name: Nordstrom Bistro N
review description: Although we've been here a few times, and the food and service are always very good, this recent visit was a surprise in terms of the number of families and children. As a result, it was a bit noisier than we prefer.

name: Oceanaire Seafood Room - Houston
address: 5061 Westheimer Rd Suite 8050 Galleria Houston Houston, TX  77056
review description: I was dissapointed in the food. we ate at the Oceanaire. in Orlando and had. a great meal. Our fish at the Houston location was overcooked

name: Olivette
address: 111 North Post Oak Lane Houston, TX  77024
review description: FIRST TIME DINING THERE. Had a party if nine. Not sure if waiting over one hour for food her is the norm. I had shrimp sandwich and fruit. sandwich was good and fruit fresh.

name: Ouisie's Table
review description: As expected Ouisie's Table was a fantastic evening. The service, the live music, the ambiance... everything was exceptional. The table was preset with our wine selection already waiting. The requested glasses of champagne were delivered just at the perfect moment and the two appetizers came moments later. My wife was very impressed. Our one and only less than 4 star experience was the scallops she ordered. They just weren't as appealing as she had hoped. Otherwise everything, including the dessert, was impeccable. My wife hasn't stopped boasting about our evening since. Thank you Ousie's Table for helping me to have a special evening with my wife in honor of her birthday. We loved it.

name: Palazzo's Trattoria
review description: Out for a special dinner with our 15 year old. Food was good and our server was terrific! there were two large parties in the area we were seated, so sometime a bit louder than was comfortable.

name: Palm Restaurant - Houston
review description: Always a great meal at The Palm. Food is always cooked well and the staff is always friendly and attentive.

name: Pappas Bros. Steakhouse
review description: Great birthday dinner celebration. Second time for us and we'll do it again.

name: Peli Peli
address: 110 Vintage Park Blvd. Suite P Houston, TX  77070
review description: This place is a hidden gem. People are now driving from 30 minutes away - Houston, The Woodlands to try it out. The food is top notch. Chef Paul is very personable and is often seen greeting patrons at their tables. I hate to give such a good review, because I know they will only get busier, but I've been here at least 6 times, and they're just awesome. Try the Hugenot Filet.

name: Perry's Italian Grille
review description: Enjoyed our meal, but portions are huge and service was very slow.

name: Perry's Steakhouse & Grille - Champions
review description: Perry's is an all in one restaurant. This location is romantic, vibrant, energetic and just a great place for lunch and dinner. The food is absolutely fabulous.

name: Perry's Steakhouse & Grille - Cinco Ranch/Katy
address: 23501 Cinco Ranch Blvd. Suite Q100 Katy, TX  77494
review description: We always go to Perry's for a special night out. We have never had a bad meal and the staff has been helpful as well as knowledgable about wine selection.

name: Perry's Steakhouse & Grille - Clear Lake
review description: Waitstaff was great, food was delicious. Enjoyed every bite, turtle soup and escargot highly recommended.

name: Perry's Steakhouse & Grille - Memorial City
review description: We were there for our anniversary with our sons. We were brought a fantastic appetizer due to a comment I had made previously about the butternut squash side dish. My husband ordered his steak "medium" and it was overcooked so we sent it back. The rest of us had our food already so it held up the rest of us eating waiting on his steak. The manager took care of the cost of the steak which we appreciated, but still our dinner felt out of sync since that had happened. It wouldn't keep us from going back, but wasn't one of our more memorable evenings there. They did a good job of trying to fix the problem with my husband's steak.

name: Perry's Steakhouse & Grille - Sugar Land
address: 2115 Town Square Place Sugar Land, TX  77479
review description: We had a business dinner on a Sunday in the private dinning room. This was the second time we had dinner there in six months and requested by my guests. It was not very busy and on Sunday wines are half off (certain wines. We ended up drinking two bottles. We had the cold seafood tower (not the best), fried calamari (excellent and tender). We all had steaks which were exceptional (slightly pricey). Service was exceptional, the waiter was very knowledgible on the food and wines.

name: Perry's Steakhouse & Grille - The Woodlands
review description: Went there for a surprise birthday. I called in early to give some special instructions and everything was followed perfectly. If you have not had the pork chop, you cannot beat this dish at Perry's. The waitress was excellent and did not rush us as we celebrated the special event. We had people from different sides of towns so we wanted to be able to visit and enjoy the birthday celebration. Perry's in The Woodlands is a neighborhood gem.

name: Philippe Restaurant + Lounge
address: 1800 Post Oak Blvd Suite 6110 Houston, TX  77056
review description: Always an outstanding dining experience with creative, luscious specials for lunch..the best time to go

name: Piatto Italian Ristorante (Galleria)
review description: Juan our waiter was fabulous handling our big group. Many thanks.

name: Piatto Italian Ristorante (Royal Oaks)
review description: Imagine the night before the AVON Walk - Houston. 8 women ( 4 from the Chicago area coming just to walk Houston) getting ready to walk a total of 39.3 miles in two days for Breast Cancer Awareness and Research... Anxious.. Hungry... ready for a bottle of Chianti. Needing to "Carbo load!" ... our environment was wonderful, relaxed... sitting off in the private room... laughing, crying... enjoying the comradarie and companionship.. before the big day... after being sufficiently satisfied gastrononically : ) and emotionally we had bid farewell to the our wonderful wait staff and our kind and gracious host, Mr. M. Retzafflt!

name: Piola
review description: I like the pizza here. Thin crust and so many choices to choose from.

name: Piqueo Restaurante & Bar
review description: Friday July 13, 2012 was our third visit to Piqueo. Service was stellar, as always. We had two entrees and three small plates. The beef short ribs were incredible - tender enough to eat without a knife. Our waiter was informed, friendly and efficient without being intrusive. The saxophone player was just loud enough to provide nice background music. We had dessert on a previous visit and they were delicious. Our bill with the tip (we did not have alcohol) was $50.00 and well worth it. We will definitely be back.

name: Polovina Italian Cafe
review description: Food was good, ambiance quiet (maybe too quiet). Great family option, very good service.

name: Post Oak Grill
address: 1415 S. Post Oak Ln. Houston, TX  77056
review description: I like Post Oak Grill for business lunches. It's very convenient, quick service and good food.

name: Post Oak Grill - Sugar Land
address: 1550 Lake Pointe Parkway, Suite 500 Sugar Land, TX  77478
review description: This restaurant is a bit pricey, but consistently good. However, our last experience was a bit disconcerting. To start, we asked to be seated at an open booth. The hostess had a blank stare for several moments, and then stated that this specific table was reserved. We did not leave until quite late, and no one ever sat at the table. I requested a wine recommendation of a varietal with certain characteristics. Our server brought back a wine that would meet our criteria but was not on the wine list. We were offered this wine at 'special' price. The problem is I later found the exact wine on the list at 1/2 'special' price. Hopefully our experience was not a reflection of current management, as there are many options for fine dining.

name: Pradaria Steaks & Churrascaria
review description: The staff was very attentive. The food was very good. I especially enjoyed the hot food and salad buffet that came with the Rodizio meal. The grilled meats were comparable to other well known churrascaria type restaurants that are more expensive.

name: Prime Time Steakhouse and Bar
review description: Very nice restaurant. Atmosphere and ambiance was great. Food was good. Hubby had rib-eye which was tender and tasty. I had pork chops which were ok, didn't care for the glaze on them. Overall it was a great dining experience and plan to go back.

name: Quattro - Four Seasons Hotel - Houston
review description: The food and service were second to none. Looking forward to returning again !!!

name: Rainbow Lodge
review description: I've heard some wonderful things about this restaurant so we went here for our anniversary dinner. My husband called ahead and reserved a secluded spot and had flowers delivered. The wait staff and hostesses were very nice and accommodating even though we were 30 minutes late. Food was exceptional. I would really like to write a full review of the food but OpenTable isn't letting me, not enough characters. I will say that for those who are crab cakes elitists, ask for the sauce on the side. I was very upset with the patrons that brought their infant. Who then screeched all night. Overall, I will definitely come back.

name: Rattan Pan Asian Bistro and Wine Bar
review description: Awesome sushi! Great atmosphere! Nice staff..really couldnt ask for more.

name: Ray's Grill
review description: Food was excellent service was great we had a great night and good food

name: RDG + Bar Annie
review description: My visit to RDG Bar Annie was excellent in every way- as usual.

name: Red & White Wine Bistro
address: Toyota Center 1510 Polk Street Houston, TX  77002
review description: Buffet style food was edible, but it is obvious the prices are charged based on the captive basketball audience rather than the quality of the food. The fish was especially dry and overcooked (even when the fish came directly from the kitchen).

name: Reef
review description: The lunch menu is practically perfect.

name: The Remington
review description: The Remington has always been a favorite eatery for me. The wait staff is superb as is the presentation of the food. If you have a special dietary need, they will accomodate.

name: the restaurant at the InterContinental Houston
review description: The food was definately below average. It was a huge disappointment. I would not recommend this restaurant at all.

name: Rio Ranch Steakhouse
address: Hilton Houston Westchase 9999 Westheimer Rd. Houston, TX  77042
review description: The food was only okay. I had grilled shrimp and some of them were chared, beyond cooked plus being tasteless without the sauce that came with them. The balsamic dressing for my salad was very good. The cornbread that was served when we first got there seemed old; dry and crumbly.The worest part was the dust caked on all the decorations. If I had noticed it earlier, I would have left. If the front of the house looks bad I wonder how the kitchen looks.

name: Ristorante Cavour at the Hotel Granduca
review description: I hosted another lunch meeting today and as always, I was most pleased. They showed me their new Sunday Brunch menu, looks delicious. Can't wait to try it.

name: Roots Bistro
review description: The food was alright but very overpriced for the amount you received. The pizzas were soggy in the middle and not too exciting. The waiter was forgetful and took forever to take our drink order, bring our drinks, and take our order for main courses. I would recommend avoiding this place unless you have lots of time and just want a light snack.

name: Rudy & Paco Restaurant & Bar
review description: As always the food, wine and service was excellent. I had the Pollo Sabroso which was done to perfection and the Chipolte Rasberry sauce was just perfect for the plate. My wife had the glazed Salmon salad and her experience was the same. Paco always makes everyone feel at home and that makes the place something special!

name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Houston
review description: Food was good but not good enough to warrant the premium prices. Felt I could have spent half at Saltgrass and got just as good of a dinner.

name: Saltwater Grill
review description: Very good quality restaurant. I would like to see more non asian seafood selections.

name: Samba Grille
review description: Menu is limited but very accomidating to adjustments for restrictive diet.

name: Schilleci's New Orleans Kitchen
address: 9595 Six Pines Drive Suite 1120 The Woodlands, TX  77380
review description: Beware the French Onion soup. I had never had a bowl of French onion soup that I didn't love, and I love all cheeses. But Schilleci's choice of cheese, soggy bread, and minimal soup under the bread and cheese made for a sad combination.

name: Shearn's Restaurant
review description: Excellent food, service and surroundings with a great view!

name: Shula's Steak House - Hyatt Regency Houston
review description: Shula's is very consistent - both in food and service quality.

name: Smith & Wollensky Steakhouse - Houston
address: Highland Village- 4007 Westheimer Rd Houston, TX  77027
review description: We took our 3 kids and celebrated Father's Day here. It was a very nice experience -- great view of the Apple Store and the busy retail area below. The service was outstanding and very accommodating to our children's desires. I would definately eat there again and can see how this would be come an annual tradition for Father's Day.

name: Soma Sushi
address: 4820 Washington Ave Ste. A Houston, TX  77007
review description: This is one of our go to locations for Sushi and we had a group of seven and we all thoroughly enjoyed it. The bar bites for happy hour from 4-7 were good, Korean chicken wings, dumplings, tempura salmon rolls (the best), good but nothing that special. The treat was the (2) lobster for $20 promotion which was excellent. The prepared it two ways, one was cold and wrapped in cucumbers as a roll and the other was hot. Braised in a sweet and savory butter sauce with onions and mushrooms and this was a home run. The sashimi I sampled (salmon, octopus) was a bit of a letdown but the lobster was a hit. The service was great but I wish he would have had a bit more explanation of the menu items but he was attentive.

name: Sorrel Urban Bistro
review description: This was my first time to dine at Sorrel Urban Bistro but it won't be my last time! The food was exceptionally fresh and beautifully served! Our waiter was very nice. He even secured a piece of flour less cake for me even though it wasn't on the menu for that day!

name: Sorrento
review description: This restaurant never disappoints. Every dish we tried was excellent including the dessert.

name: Sorrento Ristorante Italiano
review description: Service was great - It just took a while to get the check.

name: Spencer's
address: Hilton Americas Houston 1600 Lamar St. Houston, TX  77010
review description: It was my birthday and I received a call from Spencer's to ask I'd I would like a private dining area which was very thoughtful. The service was fantastic, we had an appetizer, dinner and drinks served in less than an hour. The food was divine. We had the crab cakes, filet mignon, and the New York strip steak and the food was cooked to perfection. The atmosphere was quiet and romantic. We live in Houston, but plan to spend the night at the hotel and enjoy another lovely dinner real soon.

name: Spindletop
review description: It was my first time at the Spindletop and I absolutely loved it! The service, the food and the view were all great! I intend to return to this place again. Thanks for making our anniversary memorable!

name: Straits - Houston
address: 800 W. Sam Houston Parkway Suite 940 Houston, TX  77024
review description: Very noisy; hard to hear my companion's voice from across the table. Main courses were served when we had only half-finished our appetizers ! Food itself was excellent.

name: Strata Restaurant and Bar
address: 122 Vintage Park Boulevard Suite A Houston, TX  77070
review description: I love this place! The food is delicious and service couldn't be better? Prices are reasonable and it's become our favorite place to dine.

name: Strip House in Houston
review description: The food is delicious. The atmosphere is very romantic. Great place to take a loved one for a special occassion!

name: Suga's Deep South Cuisine
review description: I give it one star. The server did well until the food arrived, then he made himself scarce. Concerning the food, I can cook better than what we were served. Both my wife and I received cold vegetables. My chicken was dry, along with the side of crawfish risotto. She ordered the lamb. It was cooked medium rare, but it was not seasoned at all. The meat on both of our plates were also not warm enough. To top that off they are way over priced for the small portions that are received.The only thing that this restaurant has going for it is the ambiance. I would definately not recommend this restaurant to anyone.

name: Sullivan's Steakhouse
review description: Excellent food, courteous staff, great time

name: Sushi Raku
review description: Food and servie was great! I really do love their lunch special!

name: Suzie Wong's World Asian Food & Drinks
review description: This restaurant is amazing. The service is very friendly and attentive. There were 7 of us in our group and we all ordered something different to share. We were all pleased with our dishes and will definitely return. The owner Dawn came by to check on us a couple of times to make sure everything was up to our standards. We all left extremely happy and with plenty of leftover. The portions are huge and very reasonable. They even served us a free dessert with out entree. You don't see much of that anymore. Give it a try. YOU WILL LOVE IT.

name: t'afia
review description: Monica visited our table, and it seems like every other table also, and made sure we understood the menu and gave us personal recommendations. We felt like she appreciated us being there, which adds a special touch. The brussel sprouts are to DIE for!

name: Tango & Malbec
review description: A great place to dine. Great food and service!

name: Tapas Capriccio
review description: What a find. I had planned on going inside the loop for a celerbration dinner when I heard about Tapas Capriccio through Open Table and decided to try it out. The food was wonderful. There were five of us so we all tried different dishes and traded tastes of everything. All the dishes were favored differently and deliciously. I hate going to a restaurant and all the dishes taste the same. If driving in town is getting up down then try Tapas Capriccio for another reason to stay in the suburbs.

name: The Tasting Room - Kings Harbor
address: 1660 W. Lake Houston Pkwy Ste. 105 Kingwood, TX  77345
review description: Know for their wine selection, they carried many of my favorites from various regions and countries all at a decent price. This was my first time eating there and I was very pleased with the qualityn and taste of the food. One minor down point was the server forgot my salad order and by the time the error was uncovered the main course was ready to be served. They did provide us with a complementary dessert and the manager came by to apologize. All in all a very nice evening with friends

name: The Tasting Room @ City Centre
address: 818 Town and Country Boulevard Suite 100 Houston, TX  77024
review description: Good until the live country music blasted so loud that it cleared our half of the restaurant

name: Tila's Restaurante & Bar
review description: This is just not my kind of "mexican restaurant". I really wanted to like it because it is walking distance from my house. It's just kind of odd & I think they pride themselves in this fact. Small & quirky. I'll bet there are people who are Tila's lovers as I am not.

name: Tintos Spanish Restaurant and Wine Bar
address: 2015 W. Gray Suite J Houston, TX  77019
review description: I wine list is not up to date and the first two we ask for they did not have.

name: Tommy Bahama's Restaurant & Bar - The Woodlands
address: 9595 Six Pines Drive, Suite 700 The Woodlands, TX  77380
review description: We usually LOVE it here! We have been many times, and still plan on going back but we didn't have a great experience celebrating my husbands birthday last Tuesday. The food wasn't up to their usual standard, or service, and our order took an hour. Our reservations were at 5:45 and our food came after 7. The server kind of seemed to care and did buy us a dessert to go. Hope it's a one time bad experience. Will go back again soon.

name: Tony Mandola's
review description: Outstanding! The lightly breded scallops are to die for.

name: TQLA Houston
review description: Food was very good and the waiter was excellent. After dinner we moved over to the bar. I only wish the bartender had been as attentive as our waiter. He should be reminded that his tip depends on good service - not indifferent service.

name: Tradicao Brazilian Steakhouse - Bay Area
address: 201 West Bay Area Blvd Webster, TX  77598
review description: Reviews all over the place. Either you hate this place or you love it. All I wanted was to be equal or better than F*go. I was pleasantly surprised. After making a couple of misses trying to find it, I called and they told me they were in between Hibachi restaurant and NTB.After I found Tradicao I couldn't believe I miss it twice. It's a large stand alone building with two large columns in the front of property. Walked in to a nice modern place, upscale. When I sat, they brought us the famous cheese puffs ( hot from oven), explained how the system works and we were ready to go. The servers kept bringing meat, non stop, regardless of what color my coaster was. I tried several but decided to stick to the sirloin, lamb chops, and baby beef.

name: Tradicao Brazilian Steakhouse - Southwest Houston
review description: We visited Tradicao for lunch on my birthday and took the family. Everyone enjoyed the food and the service was very good. The filet mignon, sirloin, and the grilled shrimp were my favorite dishes. I would recommend this restaurant.

name: Triniti
review description: I am a now a Triniti Fanatic. Ryan Hildebrand and his team are astonishing!

name: Truluck's Seafood, Steak and Crab House - Houston
review description: Another great meal at Trulucks! This time the ahi tuna that I usually get wasn't on the menu, so we got a smattering of appetizers, all delicious!

name: Two Saints
review description: This is a great little place! The only problem was that there was a really noisy party right next to us, so it madee our dinner a bit less enjoyable. But overall the evening, food and service was excellent!

name: Uchi - Houston
review description: Awesome, Flawless, Amazing!!! It never gets old and is always fantastic!!

name: Underbelly
review description: This place is a must for foodies who want something adventurous but delicious. This place is a hot spot for a reason - Chef Chris knows how to push people's culinary boundaries without turning them off. Great wine and bar menu too that reflect this place's edginess and outside the box thinking. Can't wait to go back...

name: Uni Sushi
address: 9595 Six Pines Drive, Suite 860 Suite#860 The Woodlands, TX  77380
review description: Great versatile menu if you opt for no sushi. I don't recommend passing up on the sushi, amazingly fresh and unique flavor combinations.

name: The Union Kitchen
review description: Good, casual neighborhood place. Would try again. Server very eager.

name: The Union Kitchen (Memorial Dr)
review description: This new neighborhood restaurant feels like it has been around for years ..... In a good way! Friendly staff, great food and a casual atmosphere make it the perfect addition to the memorial area options. Highly recommended.

name: Up
review description: Excellent as always. A lovely respite from the usual.

name: Uptown Sushi
address: 1131 Uptown Park Blvd, Ste 14 Houston, TX  77056
review description: Very creative food, and a unique modern decor.

name: Valentino Vin Bar - Houston
review description: We went for one of their special dinners, I have gone to at least 4 of these. I always have a great time.

name: The Veranda
review description: What an absolute treasure of a restaurant. The Veranda is a truly local restaurant where the food is incredible, and you get to know the owners personally. My wife and I had just landed at Houston Intercontinental and I used OpenTable to find a good restaurant. Relying on the great reviews, we decided to try the Veranda. I can honestly say that meal became one of our favorite restaurant experiences of all time. The food was among the best we have ever had. The owners, who are musical artists, also interacted with us personally and genuinely. They have had the restaurant at the same location for 16 years. Quaint and excellent. Very reasonable prices. On our list of "have to go to" places when in Houston.

name: Veritas Wine and Bistro
address: 830 University Drive East, Suite 400 College Station, TX  77840
review description: A top restaurant for College Station or anywhere! Wonderful food, wine, and service.

name: Via Emilia - The Woodlands
address: 10700 Kuykendahl Rd. Suite F The Woodlands, TX  77381
review description: I had a great time at this place. Received great service and everyone was extremely friendly.

name: Vic & Anthony's Steakhouse - Houston
review description: Best steakhouse I've been to in Houston!

name: Vida Loca Mexican Bar and Grill
review description: We appreciated the extra effort made to find us a seat so we could hear the band Identity Crisis. We enjoy hearing them play so much. The host went to great trouble to find us a place. We ended up dead center in front of the band. It was a most enjoyable evening as far as the band, help from the wait staff, and being with our friends.

name: Vida Mexican Restaurant
review description: We have considered dining at Vidal since it opened. Now, we are sorry that we waited so long to try this undiscovered gem. We found the quality of food that we love at Tila's with the service and atmosphere that has disappeared from this old favorite of ours. It's not a spot for families with the erotic artwork and club-like feel. Kudos to the staff for a great dinner!

name: White Oak Kitchen + Drinks
review description: I was there with a party of ten and the service was on the slow side. Food was quite good. Music was a loud and interfered with easy dinner conversation.

name: Willie G's - Post Oak
review description: We had a nice dinner, but the restaurant is loud so it is difficult to hear if you want to have a conversation. The service and the food was very good. We seemed to have some pesky knats that kept buzzing our table which was annoying.

name: Zushi Japanese Cuisine
review description: Service started out difficult but with another server stepping in things smoothed out. The 6 of us moved from a table to the sushi bar. Sushi Chefs Chris & Jay took fantastic care of us all. Their recommendations and combinations were exceptional! ( ...like eel and mango or spicy tuna and avocado...) The food was fresh and completely over the top. The best experience at Zushi is definitely at the sushi bar!
